peril.model.board.links

Enum ModelLinkState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ModelLinkState>
      • peril.model.board.links.ModelLinkState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ModelLinkState>

    public enum ModelLinkState
extends java.lang.Enum<ModelLinkState>
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a type of link between two ModelCountrys used by ModelLink.
    Since:
    2018-03-16
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BLOCKADE
      A ModelLinkState that prevents any units from being transfered across it.
      OPEN
      A ModelLinkState that is completely open and does not effect units transferring over it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String name
      The name of this ModelLinkState.
